title: Create fixture details and listing page
description: Build a user-friendly fixture listing and details page that shows upcoming fixtures, past results, and fixture information. This serves both players and captains who need to see match schedules.
acceptance_criteria: Fixture listing page shows upcoming and past fixtures
Filter fixtures by week, division, team
Fixture details page shows full match information
Show selected players (if captain) or player's own selection status

query_logic: Join fixtures with teams, divisions, venues
Include fixture_players if user is captain of the team
Order by date ascending for upcoming, descending for past

testing_requirements: Test fixture listing shows correct fixtures
Test filtering by week and division
Test fixture details page loads correctly
Verify regular players see only their selection status

context.user_story: As a player or captain, I want to see a list of fixtures and click for details so I can plan my schedule and see match information
